name: Bombay Grill - Authentic North Indian Restaurant

reviews.text:
Vegetarian Only Review:

Food: One of the bad Veg Biryani I had. The vegetables used are frozen one's and the rice also doesn't tastes good in terms of their flavor. Probably one can get better elsewhere for the price.
The veg gravy given for biryani is also a frozen one and not prepared fresh on the day as I felt it cold while having it.
The onion pakoda isn't good too, I felt that the flour used probably is a freezed one and didn't taste good, I had good one's before so this isn't good.

The carrot halwa is not that bad and not super nice either. It is just ok.

Good: The lime soda was perfect ðŸ‘Œ, it was one of the best lime soda I've had recently.

Staff: I placed a grab takeaway order and the staff was kind enough to allow me have the food in the restaurant.

Ambience: It's like any other typical restaurant, nothing fanciful.

You can read my other contributions. So to say this is totally an unbiased review.
$58.90 for mocktail, lassi, noodles, naan, chicken and tandoori gobi. Nice
I didnâ€™t thought much when I come for lunch and I am happy that I did. The rice of the lunch set tastes great along with the curry sides. I would definitely come again ðŸ˜Š

I used eatigo here for lunch.
It was very reasonable and also taste very good.
I would like to revisit, sure.
I strongly recommend to try!!
Really underrated place!! The food is tasty, and the prices are affordable. Recommend the Andhra chicken curry, it is tender and flavourful
